NPM packages

<click-time-domain>

empty time domain component

07/29/2020 - 07/29/2020 (1 Day) todayMM/DD/YYYY<click-time-domain></click-time-domain>

custom class for modal

07/29/2020 - 07/29/2020 (1 Day) todayMM/DD/YYYY<click-time-domain customModalClass="all-text-red-custom-class"></click-time-domain>

custom mask

29-7-20 - 29-7-20 (1 Day) todayD-M-YY<click-time-domain mask="D-M-YY"></click-time-domain>

set dates

02/02/2002 - 02/10/2002 (9 Days) todayMM/DD/YYYY
      const dates = {
        to: new Date(2002, 1, 11),
        from: new Date(2002, 1, 3),
      };
      <click-time-domain [calendarState]="dates"></click-time-domain>

relative state moves dates forward

07/19/2020 - 07/19/2020 (1 Day) todayMM/DD/YYYY
      const state = {
        to: new Date(2002, 1, 11),
        from: new Date(2002, 1, 11),
        isRelative: true,
        currentDate: new Date(2002, 1, 21),
      }
      <click-time-domain [calendarState]="state"></click-time-domain>

save event

07/19/2020 - 07/19/2020 (1 Day) todayMM/DD/YYYY
     <click-time-domain
      [calendarState]="state"
      (datesSaved)="onDatesChanged($event)"
     ></click-time-domain>

localization time domain

07/29/2020 - 07/29/2020 (1 День) СегодняMM/DD/YYYY
<click-time-domain [translations]="translations"></click-time-domain>
